content:
"And you call me stupid?"
No, I called you CS and stupid.
"You don't see the wisdom of building and guarding a wall in our own state?"

"you're blaming Texas for turning California blue?"
I said they "HELPED turn California blue." The feds are responsible for guarding the borders and deporting people --- not Californians. All 50 states vote for President and Congress, and most of them didn't care about all the illegal aliens as long as they didn't go to their state. I'm not in charge of saving America. We have a Constitution to tell us what to do. Article 4, Section 4 says that the feds you elect shall keep the states safe from invasion. Quit sending open-borders Rs and Ds to Congress and the White House, and then blaming someone else for what you did.
